channel.title: Adding items to shops
channel.description:
Hello, i am having a little trouble adding runes to my shop, i am using a deltascape source.
Ok, what i am trying to do is add nature and blood runes into the rune shop in fally. But every time i add them into the shop in shops.cfg, ill get an error when running, and things in other shops turn to nulls. I looked in shophandler and saw something about maxinshopitems, idk if that has something to do with it??

item.title: Adding items to shops

item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

Hello, i am having a little trouble adding runes to my shop, i am using a deltascape source.

Ok, what i am trying to do is add nature and blood runes into the rune shop in fally. But every time i add them into the shop in shops.cfg, ill get an error when running, and things in other shops turn to nulls.
I looked in shophandler and saw something about maxinshopitems, idk if that has something to do with it??
